The customer asked "What do I do with all this extra power?" So they connected the upper floor and ground floor separately as independent systems, reaching 20-22 amps usage. The customer then wanted to add split AC units to use the remaining capacity, showing how proper design can lead to expanded usage rather than waste.

Muayad was part of a team of less than 10 people who conducted feasibility studies for over 1,000 government buildings to convert them to eco-friendly structures. This creates a challenging barrier for new graduates but also means successful sustainable projects can spread rapidly through word-of-mouth in trusted networks.
